title: The Evolution of Puppy Dog Eyes & Kyle Kashuv's Harvard Rejection | Tom Perez
itunes:title: The Evolution of Puppy Dog Eyes & Kyle Kashuv's Harvard Rejection | Tom Perez
description:
A study finds dogs' eyes evolved to appeal to humans, Harvard rejects a Parkland survivor over racist comments he posted online, and DNC Chair Tom Perez stops by.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
